TopicTitle: Hey it's good to be here

Articles.Content: Hey everyone, just wanted to say thank you for making such a great game. I want to let you know that I played this game on recommendation from a friend. This game has pulled me away from both XCOM:EU and Bioshock Infinate. You guys rock and you actually care about your customers!
Welcome aboard, if a forum hasn't been posted in for months, blame the spaceship jeb crashed into KSPs forums that caused a backdate to October. Godspeed good fellow!
It pulled me from Bioshock too, I really should finish that game.
